venue.name: Rabb Auditorium at Boston Public Library in Copley Square

item.description:
Hello Networkers!

I hope everyone had a wonderful Thanksgiving! I'm looking forward to seeing everyone and some new faces too at our meeting on Tuesday. We will start promptly at 7 PM, meet us in the library lobby(right side, by the bench). Bring business cards, information on yourself, and creative ideas for our group!

Stephanie

group.name: The Boston Green Business Networking Group

item.name: Meetup this Tuesday!
